title: ABOUT US
heading:
Cost Consulting &
Project Management
text: We provide the full range of cost management services for the construction project life span, which start from advising on the feasibility of a project at the early concept stages, to settling the final contractor payment at completion of the project. During the design stage we provide cost planning services to maintain an alignment between project requirements, the design and funding availability. We do this on behalf of the owner or the design team.
